html:
11.1.24  9:24 am   do you ever sit down and deeply question if pigeons are real?

      nee but ik vraag me wel eens af of duiven toch ook 'doves' zijn

11.1.24  7:31 am   Do you have any daily practice/'ritual' you do besides working on whatever the current project is?

      language learning

11.1.24  7:30 am   Is clear a color

      could happen. if you need to distinguish between 5 different things, where one of them is clear and the other 4 are not clear but they are different colors, then 'clear' will start to be handled linguistically as a color

11.1.24  6:58 am   Do you like paralellograms?

      sure, especially orthogonal ones

11.1.24  6:40 am   how many licks does it take to get to the center of a tootsie pop

      more importantly, how many tootsie pops does it take to find out

11.1.24  5:20 am   Can you recommend me a good perfume ? ( For women.. or both women and men )

      i recommend them all. but don't take my word for it, try them all

11.1.24  2:45 am   If someone is running unopposed, should I vote for them or just not vote for anyone? I don't know who to write in. 

      maybe it's time to bring back those chads

11.1.24  2:21 am   would you agree that the sun is too bright, and that we should turn it down a bit?

      i wouldn't mess with the sun. at least not yet

11.1.24  2:16 am   What is outside of the world border?

      another world

11.1.24  2:15 am   why don't you share your political views?

      when it comes right down to it, i'm not entirely sure even what a political view is. it reminds me of the old riddle, "is it quicker to go to chicago, or by train?"

11.1.24  2:08 am   I FUCKING LOVE THE GROUND PLANE SONG fucking love it

      that should keep me going for another several weeks

11.1.24  2:07 am   what is your favourite way to walk around?

      walking is impossible to describe

11.1.24  1:48 am   What happens after all the questions are asked?

      maybe you could ask some of the same ones again

11.1.24  1:05 am   It's such a rush to post music that expresses a part of your life genuinely. I just posted a song that speaks to a personal slice of my life and it feels great. Would you say that's why music is so nice to do in general

      communication in general is gratifying, for people to share what it's like to be each other





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

10.31.24  11:18 pm   do you enjoy answering these questions or is it more of a formality for you?

      what i think i'm hearing you say is, you don't think enjoyment can be formal, or, you don't think formality can be enjoyable

10.31.24  8:52 pm   what is the shape of the earth

      it's hard to describe

10.31.24  7:53 pm   How do i fly a plane?

      maybe you can get a second plane, to fly the first plane

10.31.24  5:51 pm   when someone says a title of one of your songs do you always read it musically

      no

10.31.24  4:45 pm   what is the most decisive vegetable? i would say the potato is the least decisive

      ah then you haven't waited long enough

10.31.24  2:58 pm   Do you have a favorite time signature? 

      regular

10.31.24  12:42 pm   is english a real language or propaganda

      why can't it be both

10.31.24  12:36 pm   would a physicist who'd never played pool be better at pool than a non-physicist who'd never played pool?

      being a physicist would help, but the other person might have some other skill that might also help. for example, if the other person was a professional golfer, that would likely be a bigger advantage

10.31.24  12:29 pm   if you grew up in a pennsylvania valley surrounded by rotting factories and mountains, what chords would you use in your music? i think the answer is 7 and 9 chords with a touch of distortion, but i want to know what you think.

      i'd use all the same chords i use today

10.31.24  11:29 am   Have you ever made the unfortunate mistake of touching the ground when the floor was lava 

      no, but sometimes i forget to return to the ground when it's not

10.31.24  11:01 am   did you know you can whistle with a jolly rancher wrapper?

      somehow that doesn't surprise me

10.31.24  10:10 am   Do you enjoy wearing parkas? I find myself very fancy in them.

      i don't currently own a parka. actually that might not be true, i don't have a firm grasp of the word parka

10.31.24  8:05 am   What's the difference between an awesome thing, a fantastic thing, and an excellent thing?

      in this case, just the sound of the words

10.31.24  7:00 am   What are you gonna be for halloween? 

      in the summer, apparently

10.31.24  6:25 am   i can't find any conversational content in the language i want to laern

      the advantage here is, it will make you cherish even more dearly the content you do manage to find. maybe that might even inspire you to find and meet real people in that language

10.31.24  6:08 am   how many questions until every question that was ever asked has been asked as many times as there is questions?

      at least in the trillions

10.31.24  4:04 am   what question should i ask?

      "what question should i ask?"

10.31.24  2:15 am   What is the meaning of violence?

      technically it's when change happens much too quickly

10.31.24  12:35 am   If Dick Cheney was right in front of you, what would you say to him?

      i would wait for him to speak first

10.31.24  12:05 am   Have you ever tried making something that can only be only enjoyed exactly one time? How would you even go about doing that, and which time would you want it to be enjoyed?

      that would be any unrecorded conversation i've ever had

10.30.24  10:34 pm   How in the world do you have the patience to animate?

      how in the world do you have patience for time to go by so fast

10.30.24  10:34 pm   how to improve my memory because mine is crappy, or too crappy for college

      it all comes down to what you genuinely want to remember. this may be bad news, or maybe a lifehack, depending on how you interpret it

10.30.24  9:32 pm   do you remember your favorite childhood memory?

      no

10.30.24  8:01 pm   u gonna go on more talk shows? maybe even make one of ur own? thatd b awesome saucesome

      i'm working on it

10.30.24  7:50 pm   How many eyes is too many?

      just enough to see absolutely everything

10.30.24  6:54 pm   what do you think about the second moon?

      clickbait

10.30.24  4:38 pm   why do you need so many microphones to mic a drum kit, like no other instrument needs that many

      you're right, something's wrong

10.30.24  4:37 pm   can you please respond to this question with dutch

      "ik vraag me af of de 89e gracht ook prachtig is" - Verstuurd vanaf mijn fiets

10.30.24  4:34 pm   what does a quote mean to you? who decides what becomes a quote?

     anyone trying to express themselves who finds it useful to refer to something that someone else has said

10.30.24  4:25 pm   What makes things awkward?

      it's always been awkward, but maybe someone just pointed it out

10.30.24  3:19 pm   why is it that ambulance sirens in america sound like a freaking nuclear siren, while in europe it's a nice melody?

      perhaps the melody can't be used in america due to legal pressure from the marvin gaye estate, who claims to own the copyright

10.30.24  3:13 pm   which tree is your biggest role model?

      palm

10.30.24  12:49 pm   on paper, shouldn't the 'perfect aspect ratio' be something between 4:3 and 16:9?

      as far as i know, it's somewhere between 0:1 and 1:0

10.30.24  12:35 pm   in toki pona, there can be as many combinations as you want, each with new meanings. but these meanings never go beyond the meanings of the words that comprise them. if "moving house" was always a car, that would just be a new word, and then toki pona would have 121 words. but speakers avoid that, so it still has 120 words. 

      in that case, i wonder how they would say 'Microsoft DOS'

10.30.24  12:28 pm   what kind of haircut should i get!?!??!

      you about the 'kitchen sink'

10.30.24  11:46 am   what made you make this website

      it was easier than emailing the content to everyone individually
